input.sentences: the family went on vacation to location .
our hosts welcomed us with open arms !
our shack was very cosy and rustic .
that morning we went on a guided tour of the water front .
later that afternoon we went on a raft ride . it was a great way to end the day .
output.sentences: We had an ideal vacation location, Florida.
When we pulled up to the area, we were greeted by animals.
Around the corner sat our rustic yet cozy shack.
The next morning we walked the water and enjoyed the views.
We also went canoeing with our tour guide.
